title: Summary of Developer Live Stream on 12/1 (Mon)
contents: Greetings, Descendants!¬†In this Developer Livestream, we revealed a range of updates scheduled for 12/4 (Thu), including Ultimate Yujin, the new Infiltration Operation "Forbidden Sanctuary," the new Void Abyss Colossus "Grim Reaper," as well as new External Components/Modules, and balance adjustments.¬†For more details, please check out our YouTube channel. ‚Äª Some content related to December and first half of 2026 updates revealed during the broadcast may be subject to change upon actual release.¬†‚ñ† New Descendant: Ultimate Yujin- The new Descendant Ultimate Yujin and his new story will be added.- 2 New exclusive Modules will be added.CategoryDescriptionCombat ProtocolA new combat style Module that consumes HP to deal Skill Damage to enemies, then recovers HP by utilizing buffs and debuffs.Battlefield MedicA Party oriented Module where your attack increases as you fulfill a support role in the Party.- The Ultimate Yujin Premium Skin "Extreme Savior" will be added.- Yujin Improvements: Yujin's buff capabilities have been enhanced so that when Yujin is in a Party, ally firepower increases more significantly. Additionally, a Movement Speed buff has been added to base Yujin, and overall skill convenience has been improved.¬†‚ñ† New Infiltration Operation: Forbidden Sanctuary- The "Forbidden Sanctuary" is a new Infiltration Operation set in an Order of Truth experimental facility discovered in Axion.- The difficulty scaling based on Party size has been redesigned to alleviate the sharp difficulty spike that was previously reported in multiplayer actives like the Medium-Sized Facility Zone/Supermassive Receptor.- New Boss "Abandoned Fusion Form": An experimental subject created by combining human and Vulgus genes, this boss uses a variety of Toxic attack patterns.- This will be the primary source for Ultimate Yujin Blueprints, and new Trigger Modules can also be obtained from the Forbidden Sanctuary. Additionally, you can obtain up to 10 Ancestors Modules as Weekly Completion Rewards.¬†‚ñ† New Void Abyss Intercept Battle: Grim Reaper- A new Void Abyss Colossus "Grim Reaper," a variant of Death Stalker, will be added.- As a Toxic Colossus, the battle takes place in Void Space with a fresh atmosphere.- It uses a number of AoE skills and the combat structure is designed to reward efficient evasion and responses to attacks.- Void Abyss Grim Reaper themed Skins and Colotoys will also be added.¬†‚ñ† New External Components and Modules- New External Component "Sprint Accelerator": A new Bunny exclusive External Component set was designed to serve as a viable alternative to the "Slayer" set commonly used in current Bunny builds.- 3 New Trigger ModulesCategoryDescriptionInfected WeaponA Module that applies Arche Infection effects via "Continuous Damage" and deals additional damage when using Unique Weapons, allowing it to be used by Freyna.Ground EruptionA Module that triggers additional damage when using "Global DoT" damage is dealt to targets affected by Ground DoT, enabling Viessa and Valby to operate both Skill types simultaneously.Instant AccelerationA Module that grants a Movement Speed buff upon ending a "Movement Restriction" type Skill, providing the ability to catch up after having been hit by a skill that hinders mobility.- 3 New Melee Weapon ModulesCategoryDescriptionExecutionA Module that increases Critical Hit Damage, enabling Critical Hit builds to trigger more frequently the more enemies are eliminated in one hit.OverpowerAn Impact Rounds specific Module that increases Melee Weapon Critical Hit Damage when using Special Attacks.Eye of MorvaldeAn Impact Rounds specific Module that significantly increases Critical Hit Damage on Critical Hits. While its single-hit peak is higher than "Overpower," it has a cooldown, making it useful for tempo-based combat.¬†‚ñ† Monthly Rebalance- Ajax: Improvements will be made to enable more active utilization of firearms and reflection damage.„Ñ¥ Auto-Reload functionality will be added when shooting enemies hit by "Orbit Barrier" or affected by firearm reflection damage.„Ñ¥ "Expulsion" will receive a significant increase to the Taunt effect range, and "Hyper Cube" will add a decrease to enemy ATK and an increase to ally DEF effects.„Ñ¥ Damage output will be further improved through synergy with the "Void Explosion" Skill Module.„Ñ¥ "Barrier Charge" will be changed from carrying a barrier to a skill that dashes forward with the barrier, dealing damage to enemies ahead.„Ñ¥ "Mobile Fortress" is a renamed version of the "Life Barrier" Skill Module, which has been modified so the barrier follows Ajax and can be utilized while moving.- Numerical Balance Adjustments for Descendants„Ñ¥ We plan to make minor adjustments to the numerical balance of Freyna, Valby, and Viessa, and will review mechanism improvements after higher-priority Descendant improvements.„Ñ¥ In the January update, we will add a smart casting option, providing control settings that allow instant activation of placement-type skills such as Vie...

Managing Registered Items for Sale, wording that could cause misunderstanding has been revised.Greetings, Descendants!¬†We would like to introduce the in-game "Trading System" to enhance the convenience for our Descendants,the "BETA Trade Market" has opened on the official website.¬†Please refer to the guide below for instructions on how to use the Trade Market.¬†‚ñ† What is the BETA Trade Market?- Descendants who wish to sell items can register the desired items and buyers can search for and attempt to purchase the registered items.- As this is the first introduction of a trading system, it will initially open as a beta service to ensure service stability, and will later transition to an official service.¬†‚ñ† Selling Guide1. This occurred during the process of increasing Melee Weapon Sprint speeds and resulted in behavior that deviated from the Dev Team‚Äôs intentions, ultimately conflicting with our goal of preserving each Descendant‚Äôs unique identity.¬†In this patch, we‚Äôve adjusted the method used to increase Melee Weapon Sprint speed so that only Bunny can reach a Sprint speed of 1600 through her skills, as originally designed. contents: Greetings, Descendants. This is Minseok Joo, Director of The First Descendant. We have thoroughly reviewed all feedback regarding the quality of the Halloween skins. We sincerely empathize with your concerns, and based on this feedback, we have reoriented our approach for individual skins being prepared from 2026 onward to ensure that each Descendant has a clear and distinct identity.¬†\¬†¬†¬†However, since skin production‚Äîfrom design to implementation and release‚Äîrequires several months or more, the new direction could not be applied to the Halloween skins or some that are already in production. We sincerely apologize to those who may have felt disappointed by this.¬†The entire Dev Team has reviewed the feedback provided regarding the individual skins currently being released. As a result, we have decided that the previously revealed ‚ÄúCleaning Service‚Äù and ‚ÄúMedical Support‚Äù skins, introduced during the recent Dev Live, will not be sold as paid products. Instead, they will be made available through various future events and other in-game activities. We will provide a separate announcement regarding their release schedule at a later date.¬†Moving forward, we will thoroughly prepare individual skins to ensure both distinctiveness and quality for each skin. However, as the number of Descendants increases, it is becoming increasingly difficult to create individual skins for all Descendants simultaneously. Therefore, we plan to rotate Descendants for each individual skin theme going forward. However, when there are major season updates, we plan to release skins for all Descendants together. Of course, we will continue to release universal skins as well.¬†Beyond skins, we are reviewing all the feedback from the community following the October update. We are currently establishing mid-to-long-term development plans to address The First Descendant's shortcomings and improve its overall quality, and plan to share more information through a separate announcement once preparations are complete.¬†The Dev Team will continue to steadily improve the game's quality and address content shortage issues. We are deeply grateful for your continued support and love for The First Descendant. The decision to make the aforementioned skins available as event rewards reflects our sincere desire to give back to our dedicated Descendants.¬†The Dev Team remains committed to delivering a better game experience. Thank you once again to all who stand with us on this journey.

title: The First Descendant Tokyo Game Show 2025 Key Updates
contents: Greetings, Descendants!This year at Tokyo Game Show (TGS) 2025, it was a truly meaningful experience to meet so many of our Descendants in person. We would like to sincerely thank not only those who visited us on-site, but also everyone who joined us through the various online events.For those who were unable to attend in person, we‚Äôve prepared a summary of the major highlights revealed during TGS.‚ñ† The First Descendant x Bayonetta Collaboration TrailerThe highly anticipated Bayonetta collaboration trailer was first revealed on 9/25 (Thu), with the start of the TGS.A variety of new customization items inspired by Bayonetta‚Äôs unique charm will be available in-game starting with the Season 3 Episode 2 update on November 6.‚ñ† TGS & October Update Preview | Developer Live StreamOn 9/27 (Sat), we held a developer live stream touring the TGS venue and introducing the upcoming October update.CM Jason toured the booth with cosplayers, and Producer Lee Beom-jun and Director Joo Minseok also made an appearance to share the vibrant atmosphere of the event.In addition to that, gameplay footage was revealed for the new Void Vessel Dungeon and the Void Abyss Intercept Battle "Lava Citadel" coming in the 10/1 update.Check out more October update news via the video and summary below.Summary of Developer Live Stream on 9/27 (Sat)‚ñ† Booth Overview- Hover Bike ZoneIn the Hover Bike Zone, visitors could mount a life-sized ‚ÄòVortex‚Äô on display. The interior featured implemented driving screens, showcasing impressive detail.- Lounge ZoneThe new Lounge feature, added in the September update, was recreated at TGS to let visitors enjoy the same relaxing atmosphere in real life.- Demo ZoneIn addition to all of that, we prepared a Demo area where visitors could experience The First Descendant's exhilarating combat and gameplay, as well as receive special in-game Coupons.‚ñ† Merch EventDescendants who joined the on-site event received an acrylic diorama featuring Ultimate Bunny, Ultimate Luna, and the Hover Bike. Each participant also received a game coupon, a sticker, and a reusable bag, adding to the excitement at the venue.The moments we shared with our Descendants at TGS 2025 have become precious memories for us as well.We look forward to meeting you again at a variety of venues with more exciting news and fun experiences.Thank you.

title: Summary of Developer Live Stream on 9/27 (Sat)
contents: Greetings, Descendants!¬†In the Developer Livestream on September 27th, we brought you live updates from TGS 2025,and shared information about the core content updates, convenience improvements, balance adjustments, new skins, and events planned for the upcoming October 1st update.¬†We would like to thank all the Descendants who joined the stream. Please check the YouTube video for more detailed information, including updates from TGS.¬†The First Descendant | TGS & October Update Preview Livestream | Dev Livestream‚Äª Some update content revealed during the broadcast may be subject to change in the actual update.¬†‚ñ† New Sword Weapons "Shadow" and "Deus Ex Manus"- The sword weapons "Shadow" and "Deus Ex Manus" will be introduced, along with sword-specific Modules and External Components sets (Manus Set).- Four Weapon Skins exclusive to Swords, including two transcendent tier skins will also be released, featuring unique effects and sound effects unlike existing Skins.¬†‚ñ† New Void Vessel Dungeon "Medium-Sized Facility Zone"- The Void Vessel will feature a new "Medium-Sized Facility Zone" with Normal and Hard Difficulties.- The new Named Monster "Arche Slayer" provides a unique combat experience using sword-based charge patterns. title: 10/1(Wed) QoL Improvements Update Info
contents: Greetings, Descendants!¬†The October 1 (Wed) update will bring a variety of new content, including the addition of Sword weapons, along with several improvements aimed at enhancing overall gameplay convenience.¬†Here‚Äôs a preview of the major QoL improvements in this update, and we appreciate your continued support for the upcoming October update.¬†‚ñ† Major QoL Improvements(1) Removal of Reactor Weapon Optimization Conditions- To allow for more flexible use of different weapons and improve accessibility for new players, Optimization Conditions that were only applied when equipping specific weapons will be removed.- Accordingly, the "Reactor Implant" function in the Auxiliary Workbench, related Quests, and Awards will also be removed.- Additionally, with the removal of Optimization Conditions, the Skill Power increase that previously activated when meeting these conditions will be incorporated into the Reactor's base Skill Power.¬†¬†(2) Changes to Amorphous Material Opening Method- To reduce the hassle of opening Amorphous Materials, this function will be improved to allow single or continuous opening through interaction with NPCs located in Albion.- As a result, the Reconstructed Devices that were created when clearing Void Intercept Battles and Void Fusion Reactors will be removed.- Additionally, please note that the Void Intercept Battle: Hard will be revised in the future and the current content format will be maintained until then.¬†(3) Laboratory Improvements- The "Legion of Breach," a new legion introduced in Season 3 Axion Plains, will be added to the Laboratory Legion settings.- The maximum number of Common Monsters that can be summoned in the Laboratory will be increased to 50.¬†We will continue to consider and implement improvements to enhance convenience and satisfaction for our Descendants.Thank you.

title: Apology and Compensation Announcement for Issues After Season 3 Update
contents: Greetings Descendants. This is The First Descendant Producer Beom-jun Lee.¬†I would like to sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and disappointment you experienced due to the recurring issues during the recent Season 3 update. Through today‚Äôs announcement, I would like to address the issues related to the "Battle Pass" and "Wall Crasher" content.¬†First, regarding the "Battle Pass," there were continuous errors such as Weekly Challenges not refreshing and abnormal Daily Challenge EXP gains, which directly affected our Descendants' achievements and rewards. This issue arose during our response to Battle Pass errors after the 1.3.1 patch, and it was caused by inadequate handling by the Dev Team and an insufficient QA process. As the person in charge, I would like to apologize once again. We would like to assure you that we are continuously working to resolve the remaining issues.¬†Next, regarding the highly anticipated "Wall Crasher," we identified issues with reward drops at the beginning of the season, as well as unintended gameplay that exploited the party play function. We are currently preparing improvements for these issues.¬†We also humbly accept the feedback that Season 3 content as a whole has not met expectations in terms of stability and completeness. The Dev Team will do their utmost to address the remaining issues with urgency while ensuring the previously announced monthly update plans continue without delay.¬†In addition, the Dev Team aims to pursue more fundamental and sustainable improvements by learning from the issues that have emerged this season.¬†Above all, we plan to establish a more stable development environment by reorganizing inefficient internal processes that have accumulated since launch.¬†Not only will we make short-term efforts to prevent issues through more thorough inspections, but also, in the mid- to long-term, plan to comprehensively review and address problems within our inefficient development processes that have accumulated over time.¬†Through these efforts, we will do our best to develop faster and more stable response capabilities to provide updates that will better satisfy our Descendants.¬†While it may not fully make up for the disappointment our Descendants have felt regarding these issues, we have prepared the following compensation as a token of our sincerest apologies.¬†‚ñ† Compensation- Rewards will be delivered to your mailbox within approximately 10 minutes of logging in on the distribution date specified below.„Ñ¥ The Battle Pass EXP compensation will not be delivered through the Mailbox but will be automatically applied upon login. title: Our Sincere Apologies for the TikTok Advertising Issue
contents: Greetings, Descendants.¬†We would like to sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and disappointment caused by the recent issue regarding the TikTok Creative Challenge.¬†The TikTok Creative Challenge is a program where TikTok creators voluntarily produce and submit content that may be used as advertisements.¬†After confirming with TikTok, we learned that no system currently exists to verify potential copyright infringement, and TikTok is now conducting further investigations to identify any additional cases.One confirmed case involved unauthorized use of DanieltheDemon‚Äôs content by another creator. TikTok identified this as a violation of its guidelines and has already blocked the creator‚Äôs account.¬†We would also like to clarify that we do not upload creator advertisement videos as regular posts on The First Descendant‚Äôs official TikTok account. Creator advertisement videos are displayed when users access The First Descendant‚Äôs official account through advertisements.In contrast, if the official account is directly searched and visited, these creator advertisement videos are not displayed. This feature was newly implemented by TikTok on August 15 (Friday), and therefore these videos may have appeared as if they were posted and then deleted, but that is not the case.¬†We are taking the TikTok advertisement issue very seriously, recognizing that we failed to uphold the authenticity of our marketing content and to respect the efforts of our creators and community.¬†As a result, we will strengthen our advertising and marketing review processes, including additional review steps with our development team, to ensure that such issues do not recur. We are committed to thoroughly improving our review practices.¬†We will also be committed to continuously being more transparent and responsible to regain the trust of our community and creators.Once again, we deeply apologize for the disappointment and inconvenience this incident has caused.¬†Thank you for your understanding.
